cats.name: Beans
cats.description: Beans is a curios, tiny kitten who loves to play in boxes and explore the garden. He likes children and is ready for his forever home.

cats.name: Daisy and Lily
cats.description: A calm and affectionate pair of ladies who loves cuddles and lounging in the sun. They enjoy each other's company and must be adopted together.

cats.name: Kiwi, Clementine and Lichi
cats.description: These small kittens will make great family pets!

cats.name: Peanut
cats.description: A sweet, chubby senior cat who enjoys food and loves to be pampered. Looking for a new loving family since her owner passed.

cats.name: Mittens and Beanie
cats.description: Two large senior cats who are looking for a quiet home to spend their golden years. They are very affectionate and love their humans.

cats.name: Goblin
cats.description: A mischievous and grumpy cat with a knack for getting into trouble. Goblin prefers to be an only cat.

cats.name: Purrito
cats.description: A snuggly little kitten who loves to curl up like a little purrito. She needs to be in a home with another cat.

cats.name: Nugget
cats.description: A quiet and wise senior cat who enjoys lounging around and watching the world go by. Loves chin scratches!

cats.name: Sushi and Yoko
cats.description: Two playful kittens with a love for treats. They're always up for an adventure!

cats.name: Checkers
cats.description: Checkers is a loving senior cat who enjoys attention and relaxation. She would thrive in a quiet home where she can feel comfortable.

cats.name: Cheddar, Brie, Nacho
cats.description: Bright and happy kittens looking for loving families!

cats.name: Whiskers
cats.description: A big, soft and fluffy adult cat who loves a good nap and gentle petting.

cats.name: Snickers
cats.description: Snickers is a very independent and resourceful adult cat. He enjoys spending time outdoors and is great for families with an active lifestyle.

cats.name: Bob and Ponyo
cats.description: Two tiny kittens who are always causing mischief, when they are not sleeping. They make the perfect pair!

cats.name: Tater Tot and Potato
cats.description: They are playful and friendly cats who loves attention and is great with other pets. Looking for an active home to keep them stimulated.

cats.name: Mochi
cats.description: A calm and serene adult cat who enjoys spending time by the window watching the birds. She is very food motivated and loves treats.

cats.name: Simba and Nala
cats.description: Two calm and clingy kittens who love to snuggle up. They're inseparable and always ready for fun.

cats.name: Francis
cats.description: Francis is a wise old cat who enjoys relaxing and observing the world around him.

cats.name: Pickles
cats.description: A spicy cat with a bold personality and a love for exploring. He has lived with other cats and dogs.

cats.name: Sylvester
cats.description: A grumpy but lovable senior cat who's seen it all. He was previously an outdoor cat and is looking for a quiet home.

cats.name: Gracie and Frankie
cats.description: Two adorable cats with the sweetest personalities. They're inseparable and love napping together.

cats.name: Noodle
cats.description: Noodle is a sweet cat who enjoys napping in sunny spots. Looking for a family who can provide her with the care and attention she deserves.

cats.name: RuPaw
cats.description: A cool and laid-back adult cat who loves to relax and take naps. Is good with children and other cats.

cats.name: Socks, Tiny Tim, Sanchez, Banjo and Fury
cats.description: Sweet and gentle kittens who loves snuggling and playing with her friends.

cats.name: Maximus
cats.description: Maximus is a wise and loving senior cat who enjoys sitting by the window and watching the world go by. Heâ€™s looking for a peaceful home to enjoy his golden years.

cats.name: Shiba and Snowflake
cats.description: Two kittens with an adventurous spirit and a love for exploring the world together.

cats.name: Lucifer and Chicago
cats.description: The two brothers love to nap and catch mice. They grew up on a farm and loves to be outside and around people.

cats.name: Summer
cats.description: A sweet kitten who enjoys quiet time and loves to be pampered.

cats.name: Smitty
cats.description: Smitty is an elegant cat with a calm personality. She enjoys lounging in sunny spots and is friendly with other cats.

cats.name: Salami, Olive and Finigan
cats.description: Three siblings who are ready to be adopted. They're playful, energetic, and full of love!

cats.name: Basil
cats.description: Basil is a sweet-tempered and affectionate cat who likes to spend time in peaceful environments. He is great with children and other pets.

cats.name: Hector
cats.description: Hector is a strong and independent adult cat. He loves his personal space but will gladly accept pets and treats when he feels comfortable.

cats.name: Waffle, Maple, Pancake, Crumb, Muffin, Biscuit
cats.description: A litter of adorable, chubby kittens ready to find their forever home.

cats.name: Cleo
cats.description: Cleo is a friendly, confident adult cat who enjoys playing and cuddling. She can adapt to different environments, making her ideal for most families.

cats.name: Nibbles
cats.description: Nibbles is a laid-back and affectionate adult cat. She enjoys cuddling on the couch and being around people.

cats.name: Oscar and Jasper
cats.description: Two distinguished gentlemen who are looking for a quiet home to spend their retirement. They are very affectionate and love their humans.

cats.name: Moose, Pip, Mocha and Stella
cats.description: Lovable litter of cats who craves attention and affection.

cats.name: Willow
cats.description: Willow is a calm and peaceful senior cat. She is very independent but loves companionship and quiet time with her family.

cats.name: Fiona
cats.description: Fiona is a lovely senior cat who loves to relax and be pampered.

cats.name: Panda
cats.description: An excellent little fellow who would be a great companion for a family with children.
